description: Display-name-based minimal EMOS metadata - all names derived from display names

naming_conventions.source_of_truth: Display names are the primary source - everything else is derived
naming_conventions.derivation_order: Display Name → Folder Name → Class Name → File Name → ID
naming_conventions.ids: snake_case derived from display names with special case handling

derivation_rules.display_to_folder: Remove special chars, PascalCase words (with special case overrides)
derivation_rules.display_to_id: Convert to snake_case, handle special abbreviations

databases.ICSD: Inorganic Crystal Structure Database - comprehensive collection of crystal structures
databases.COD: Crystallography Open Database - open-access collection of crystal structures
databases.OQMD: Open Quantum Materials Database - high-throughput computational database
databases.AFLOWLIB: AFLOW Library - comprehensive materials database with computational data
databases.Alexandria: Alexandria PBE - DFT database for materials properties
databases.NOMAD: NOMAD Laboratory - repository for computational materials science data
databases.JARVIS: Joint Automated Repository for Various Integrated Simulations

generators.MatterGen: Diffusion model for crystal structure generation
generators.iMatGen: Inverse materials generation using deep learning
generators.MatGAN: Generative Adversarial Network for materials design
generators.Cond-DFC-VAE: Conditional Deep Feature Consistent Variational Autoencoder
generators.MyGen1: Custom generator 1 - user-defined materials generation model
generators.MyGen2: Custom generator 2 - user-defined materials generation model

predictors.MatterSim: Universal neural network potential for materials simulation
predictors.M3GNet: Materials 3D Graph Network for property prediction
predictors.PFP: Property Fingerprint Predictor for materials properties
predictors.DeepMD: Deep potential molecular dynamics for materials simulation
predictors.SynthNN: Synthesis Neural Network for synthesizability prediction
predictors.MyPred1: Custom predictor 1 - user-defined materials property prediction model
predictors.MyPred2: Custom predictor 2 - user-defined materials property prediction model

materials_exploration.Material Search: Search and explore materials from comprehensive databases using various criteria
materials_exploration.Material Generation: Generate new material compositions using AI-powered algorithms and predictive models
materials_exploration.Database Extractor: Extract and analyze specific material properties and data from integrated databases
materials_exploration.Material Characterization: Advanced materials analysis and characterization tools for comprehensive evaluation
materials_exploration.DFT Calculation: Materials optimization workflows for enhanced performance characteristics
materials_exploration.Crystallographic Analysis: Simulation and modeling tools for predicting material behavior under various conditions
materials_exploration.Quantum Mechanics: Advanced computational methods for materials discovery and design
materials_exploration.Tensor Analysis: Comprehensive analysis tools for understanding material structure-property relationships

electronics_application.Device Synthesizability: Evaluate the feasibility and methods for synthesizing electronic devices from selected materials
electronics_application.Interface Calculation: Calculate and analyze interfaces between different materials in electronic applications
electronics_application.Property Prediction: Electronic property prediction and optimization for semiconductor applications
electronics_application.Band Structure: Band structure calculations and electronic transport property analysis
electronics_application.Thermal Management: Thermal management analysis for electronic device performance optimization
electronics_application.Reliability Assessment: Reliability assessment and failure analysis for electronic materials
electronics_application.Process Integration: Process integration workflows for electronic device manufacturing
electronics_application.Advanced Characterization: Advanced characterization techniques for electronic materials evaluation

inputs.name: materialName
inputs.description: Material name or chemical formula for search

inputs.name: propertyType
inputs.description: Type of material property to search by

inputs.name: includeComposites
inputs.description: Include composite materials in search results

outputs.name: materialsCount
outputs.description: Number of materials found matching search criteria

outputs.name: topMatch
outputs.description: Best matching material from search results

outputs.name: propertyRange
outputs.description: Range of property values in search results

outputs.name: downloadLink
outputs.description: Download link for complete search results

inputs.name: targetProperties
inputs.placeholder: e.g., High conductivity, Low thermal expansion

inputs.name: elementConstraints
inputs.description: Constraints on chemical elements to use

inputs.name: numCandidates
inputs.description: Number of material candidates to generate

outputs.name: synthesisRoute
outputs.description: Suggested synthesis pathway for best candidate
